name: I Dream of Jeannie
description: I Dream of Jeannie is a TV series starring Barbara Eden, Larry Hagman, and Bill Daily. A United States astronaut finds his life vastly complicated when he stumbles on to a bottle containing a female genie.

review.name: Dreaming of Jeannie Forever
review.reviewBody: I Dream of Jeannie (1965) TV series is something of every man's dreams; to have their cake and eat it too. Which is a beautiful knockout blonde female like Jeannie and anything else desired. This is really a timeless masterpiece. The problem with Nelson is he seemed too wrapped up in his astronaut duties/career that he seem to take for granted the appealing female Genie. I bet a lot of guys watching the show would had no problem or hesitation in wanting Jeannie for themselves. When it came to Jeannie, Nelson made me feel like I wish I could go up to him and POW right in the arm for being so blind to her. It's funny but I didn't realize until now, after all these years, that the name Jeannie matches what she was... which is a Genie. Barbara Eden will always be the Genie of our dreams!

trailer.name: I Dream of Jeannie: The Complete First Season
trailer.description: Home Video Trailer from Sony Pictures Home Entertainment
